home.title: BDA eAuction of Residential Sites
home.subtitle: Conducted under BDA Disposal of Corner, Intermediate & Other eAuctionable

viewSites.title: View Sites on Map
viewSites.description: Explore all eAuction sites with interactive map, filters, and detailed information

eAuctionInfo.title: eAuction Information
eAuctionInfo.description: Learn about eligibility, documents required, financials, and Terms & Conditions

goToPortal.title: Go to eAuction Portal
goToPortal.description: Access the official eAuction portal to register and place bids

footer.disclaimer: This page is an independent, citizen-led volunteer effort by Zen Citizen, created in collaboration with <1>BDA</1>. It does not replace official BDA notifications. Zen Citizen makes no representation or warranty regarding the accuracy or completeness of the information presented.

whatIsBeingAuctioned.title: What is being eAuctioned
whatIsBeingAuctioned.description: Residential Sites at multiple BDA layouts across Bengaluru
whatIsBeingAuctioned.noteText: eAuction on "AS IS WHERE IS" basis. Physical inspection of sites is strongly advised before bidding.

whoCanParticipate.title: Who can participate?
items: Minors or persons without computer knowledge through guardians or representatives
Joint registration permitted only for blood relations (spouse, sons, unmarried daughters) Proof of relationship required

emd.title: Earnest Money Deposit (EMD)
emd.warning: EMD payment must be made ONLY on the eAuction website:
emd.warning2: If EMD payment is remitted to BDA's account instead of eAuction Portal, a 5% Service charge on EMD will be deducted during refund.

biddingRequirements.title: Bidding Requirements
items: Bid must exceed base price by at least 10%
Bid increment: Minimum Rs. 500 per sq.m

paymentAfterWinning.title: Payment after Winning
items: 25% of total cost (after adjusting EMD) within stipulated time of 3 days
Balance 75% within 45 days from allotment letter

paymentDetails.title: Payment Details
paymentDetails.bankValue: Canara Bank, BDA Complex Branch, Kumara Krupa West, Bengaluru-560020

paymentAfterWinning.warning: Failure of making payment within stipulated time will result in forfeiture of EMD

importantCautions.title: Important Cautions
items: Minimum two bidders required per site
BDA reserves right to accept or reject any bid
Sites once allotted will not be cancelled or substituted
All disputes subject to Bengaluru jurisdiction only

demo.title: Demo
demo.description: For a demonstration of the bidding process of bidding, you can visit BDA Head Office during office hours.
demo.noteText: Bidding by BDA on behalf of a bidder shall not be undertaken during the demonstration.

videoTutorials.title: Video Tutorials
items: 'Direct Supplier registration (Direction eAuction)' in the section 'New Registration user manuals'
'Pre-Qualified eAuction Bid Submission & Live Bidding' in the section 'Bid submission user manuals'

contactInfo.title: Contact Information
contactInfo.bdaQueries: For BDA Site-related queries, contact the helpline
contactInfo.eAuctionProcess: For information on the eAuction process, contact the Karnataka Public Procurement Portal
contactInfo.newHelpdesk: We've added two new eProcurement helpdesk numbers for your convenience:
contactInfo.cacPhoneWa: Phone & WhatsApp | Available 24/7, 365 days a year
contactInfo.importantText: Bidders are requested to contact BDA directly for any questions and avoid middlemen.

footer.disclaimer: This page is an independent, citizen-led volunteer effort by Zen Citizen, created in collaboration with <1>BDA</1>. It does not replace official BDA notifications. mapView.tooltip: Some sites aren't shown because location details aren't available.
